Would it possible to transfer a deb or package from a windows machine, via flash drive and install to an ubuntu machine?
should be fine ...if you use vfat for the flash drive you can mount it easily...if you use ntfs, use ntfs-3g to mount the voume
What is the terminal command for that?
find out what filesystem your flashdrive uses first.
NTFS.
then use ntfs-3g to mount the volume
find out what device it is...create a mount point for the device... mount it with ntfs-3g... and copy away
make sure to umount the device cleanly also or you'll have headaches later

you have to mount it

'fdisk -l' you'll find where it is mounted
